projects.title: Principal Cybernetics Engineer
achievements: Worked to consolidate multiple vendor provided safety systems across heavy and light vehicle fleets into a single view of driver behaviour.
Identified issues with business processes that were preventing safety system interventions working as intended and worked on remediations.
Developed solutions to improve reliability of safety systems through monitoring known silent modes of failure.
Began a project to implement better DevSecOps into our software development process.
Performed a technical review on an existing software project which resulted in that application being refactored to the cloud.
Migrated an on premises HBase cluster running time series workloads to AWS Elastic Map Reduce (EMR) with significantly less compute.
Took up a product management role to cover a secondment within the team.
Improved monitoring and alerting to ensure that we had a more reliable product and could more easily track degradations.

projects.title: Specialist Engineer/Technical Lead
achievements: Involved in multiple projects including conveyor optimisation, safety dashboard development and WTS/LTE network monitoring for autonomous and conventional haulage vehicles.
Performed root cause analysis on incidents to focus efforts to improve application reliability.
Built reliable stream and batch data collection and processing pipelines using NiFi, Kafka and Python.
Managed work for four people in an agile team, under the scrum of scrums structure.
Worked to migrate edge deployments from RHEL packages to docker compose stacks to improve deployment reliability.

projects.title: Specialist Cybernetics Engineer
achievements: Primarily involved in an operational technology project which collected approximately 20,000 numeric metrics a second from multiple minesites.
Rolled out projects to enable monitoring for South American and East Australian sites.
Developed collection code for operational technology assets including radios, safety systems, access points, microwave links and LTE equipment through a variety of protocols.
Proactively identified, fixed and added additional monitoring for issues within code and the underlying RedHat Linux production environment that hosted code.

projects.title: Undergraduate/Graduate Mechanical Engineer
achievements: Standardised thousands of legacy vessel and pipeline inspections with data sources including paper based inspections, Microsoft Access databases and Excel spreadsheets.
Assisted in a reconciliation process involving identifying the differences between asâ€‘built isometrics and general arrangements with items presently on site.
Wrote numerous VBA scripts and addons to improve productivity of myself and others.

projects.title: Undergraduate Engineer
achievements: Worked across the Project Management and Mechanical Engineering Departments.
Developed software in VBA to automate the creation of standardised engineering calculations.
Automated the creation of Project Management documents and processes using the VBA object models for Excel, Outlook and Word.
Used Primavera P6 to update the schedule of ongoing projects.
